welcome:
Hi there,

You are receiving this email because you have registered via google forms to get an alert for vaccine availability.

We will update you as soon as the slots are available. To get a direct message on telegram please follow here: https://t.me/Cowin_Availability_Slot_bot  

To Stop further alerts, please ${clickHere}

Regards,
